metadata.name: Robert Garcia, Architect of Champions
metadata.description:
Check out below the amazing bonuses that come with this NFT! 

**Robert Garcia** is a boxing legend. Not only was he a world champion himself, but he has personally trained 13 champions! 

This image was shot by Idris Erba at the Floyd Mayweather gym in L.A. 

The determination in his eyes reflects the amazing story of his life.

**Bonuses** 

An NFT this amazing deserves an awesome bonus package, and we aim to provide! 

First, you and a guest of your choosing will be invited ringside to an upcoming pro boxing match. 

Second, you'll get a pair of boxing gloves signed by Floyd Mayweather. 

Third, a pair of training gloves used in the legendary 2007 Oscar de la Hoya vs. Mayweather match. 

Fourth, a one-on-one personal training session with Rob Garcia at his L.A. gym. 

Fifth, we'll engrave a custom metal dreamcard (checkout dreamcard.cc) with your NFT image so that you can show it off every time you make a purchase. 

Last, but definitely not least, we'll be shipping you one of our highly sought-after, deluxe swag boxes with all kinds of exclusive Legend NFT items.
